episodes.title: Infiltrating the Church Of Scientology
episodes.description: Cult enthusiast Grant Offenberger and TIJ alum Tim Chizmar join for a jaw-dropping, deep dive into the world of Scientology! Grant openly investigate the Church and reveals some of what he uncovered including volcano-wielding space overlords, aliens, secret LA birthday parties, mind-bending recruitment tactics, and lavish steak dinners for the dearly departed L. Ron Hubbard. Grant shares how he infiltrated multiple Scientology centers (with his real name!) and got closer to the truth than most ever dare – earning a membership card, dodging billion-year contracts, and uncovering stories that sound more like sci-fi than real life. But did he uncover the whereabouts of David Miscavige’s missing wife, Shelly, and does it have anything to do with the evil alien Xenu?
